title: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, Bam Batmobile Redbird Prank Bibi & Quizz, Batcast Metal Diecast Vehicles, Ages 3+
descriptions:
**Get Ready for Action-Packed Fun with the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack**

Unleash your little hero's imagination with the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack. This exciting collection of diecast vehicles features five iconic characters from the DC universe, including Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz. Each car is meticulously crafted in 1:55 scale, perfect for small hands to grasp and maneuver.

Made from durable Batcast Metal diecast, these vehicles are built to withstand hours of play. The working wheels allow for smooth and seamless movement, making it easy for your child to create their own racing adventures.

This 5-pack is perfect for kids aged 3 and older, encouraging imaginative play and storytelling as they pit their favorite heroes against villains in epic racing battles. The vehicles are also compatible with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset (sold separately), allowing your child to expand their play experience and create even more thrilling adventures.

With the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, your little hero will be ready to take on the world of super hero racing action. So why wait? Get ready to rev up the fun and join the battle between good and evil!

**Includes:**

- 5 diecast vehicles: Bam the Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz
- Working wheels for smooth movement
- Compatible with Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset (sold separately)
- Perfect for kids aged 3 and older
- Encourages imaginative play and storytelling
- Durable Batcast Metal diecast construction

**Join the Batwheels Racing Action Today!**
